rows.label: tev000394_MSG0001
rows.name: Ah, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0002
rows.name:
I was just doing some target practice. We may be
mimeosomes, but our skills still weaken if we don't
stay in shape.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_JNK0010
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: tev000394_SEL0011
rows.name: Suggest Lao give Shingo some firearms training.

rows.label: tev000394_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev000394_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Lao why he hasn't been around much lately.

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0003
rows.name:
I'm sure there are lots of things I could teach Shingo
that'd give me a chance to sharpen my own skills.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0004
rows.name: But honestly, I don't have that kind of time right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0005
rows.name:
And besides, his fighting style and mine are just too
different. He'd benefit more from being trained by a
specialist.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0006
rows.name:
Though I bet that sounds like I'm just making excuses,
doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0007
rows.name: Everyone's got something they're supposed to be doing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0008
rows.name:
Tell me, when you go on a mission that you know will
put lives at risk, do you bring Lin and Tatsu along?
Or do you leave them behind?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0009
rows.name:
I might be able to use your experience to guide my
own decision.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0010
rows.name:
I can't tell you all the details, but I've got that hanging
over me just like you and Elma do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_JNK0030
rows.name: Refute

rows.label: tev000394_SEL0031
rows.name: Stress the importance of caring for your team.

rows.label: tev000394_JNK0040
rows.name: Reaffirm

rows.label: tev000394_SEL0041
rows.name: Show Lao your support.

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0011
rows.name: Huh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0012
rows.name: Doug said the exact same thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0013
rows.name:
Look, I get it. Saiden, Mondo, and Shingo...
They're dear friends to me, and I trust them completely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0014
rows.name: I'd never take them for granted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0015
rows.name:
Maybe I haven't made that very clear.
I'll try to tell them a little more about what's going on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0016
rows.name: ...There. Are you happy now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0017
rows.name:
If you're satisfied that you've meddled enough in my
business for one day, I have to be going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0018
rows.name: It's almost time for me to meet Saiden.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0019
rows.name: Catch you later.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0020
rows.name:
No more questions? You're not gonna pump me
for details?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0021
rows.name:
Thanks for that, [ST:playername ].
Your trust means a lot to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0022
rows.name:
Listen, if you get a chance, could you give Shingo
a hand with his training?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0023
rows.name:
I know he'd be excited to work with someone as
skilled as you, and I'm sure there are plenty of
things you could teach him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000394_MSG0024
rows.name: Thanks. I appreciate it.[ST:wait ]
